concept.title: LinkedIn Join Request
concept.shortdesc: LinkedIn users and LinkedIn company admins are responsible for managing join, or connection, requests.

section.title: What are LinkedIn Join Requests?
section.p: LinkedIn is a connection-based platform. Users connect with other users and company pages by sending a join request to the account administrator - either personal or company. Company admins and page owners choose which users can and cannot connect to their account.

An account's number of connections are sometimes viewed as a sign of page success. Remember, not all connections are good connections. Watch out for potential bots and scammers. Bots and scammers could cause issues within your account.
